msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left side and at the right side. Top and bottom somewhat torn. No kollesis visible. On the back, in the lower left corner, a small rectangular piece of papyrus has been pasted on, presumably for fortification. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Some additions are made in the left margin. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

div.ab: "[Column 10];Petesouchos, son of Heraklas, grandson of Heraklas, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Keras, mother Herais, drachmas 8;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Eutyches, slave of Sarapias, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinus, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Horos, grandson of Horos, mother of Taharmothes, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpekysis, grandson of Satabous, mother Tasokonopis, drachmas 12;;Apollonios, son of Ischyrion through Eutas alias Kou-;kallos;;The account tax [of land] of katoikoi of Karanis in 12th year:;drachmas 16, obols 1/2, added charges drachma 1, 2 chalkoi. In total drachmas 17, 1/2 obol and 2 chalkoi;;(left margin: drachmas 16, obols ]19 (?)) naubion for the katoikoi of the 12th year, 3 obols, added charges 1/2 obol, drachmas 1 and 2 chalkoi;;in total for the day, drachmas 168, obols 10, of which the poll tax for the 12th year drachmas 4, obols 16;;and account tax, naubion for the 12th year, drachmas 18, 4 obols;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Euhemeros, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Keras, mother Tauris, drachmas 24;;Sabinus, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Achillas, son of Ptollis, grandson of Hieronouphis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolemas, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaseis, drachmas 8;;Anchophis, son of Horos, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;12th year, Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 8;;Chairemon, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 20;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Sisouchos, grandson of Sisouchos, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Horos, mother Eseremphis, drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis, obols 28;;in total for the day, drachmas 128, obols 27,of which for the 12th year;;[Tybi] 8 likewise:;Pasion, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 8, drachmas 28;;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;in total for the day, drachmas 12, obols 27."
